content_descriptors.notes:
All sexual acts are consensual and all characters depicted are over the age of 18.
Adult language: curse/crude words are used a lot and often sexual in nature (No use of racial/minority slurs or other intentional use of derogatory language).
Sexual Dares: some dares directly or indirectly involve sexual acts, like: flashing, sending nudes, perfuming oral or engaging in consensual intercourse.
Public indecency: many of the sexual acts will be performed in a public space. Usually unnoticed.
Voyeurism: During a scene, a character is accidentally trapped in the same room as a couple having intercourse.
Tentacles: There is a consensual scene that involves a female being penetrated in several orifices by tentacles.
Sexual Acts: revealing genitals, oral sex, voyeurism, masturbation, vaginal sex, anal sex, group sex, tentacle sex.

name: A Date for the Ages Demo
